### Keyboard Bindings

#### In-page navigation
    f       Toggle links
    F       Toggle links (open link in new tab)
    k       Scroll up
    j       Scroll down
    h       Scroll left
    l       Scroll right
    u       Scroll up half page
    d       Scroll down half page
    g g     Go to top of page
    G       Go to bottom of page

#### Page/Tab navigation
    H       History back
    L       History forward
    r       Reload
    w       Next tab
    q       Previous tab
    x       Close current tab
    t       Open new tab
